Table of Contents

Class CreatureAsset

Namespace
ECCLibrary
Assembly
ECCLibrary.dll

Override this class to define a new creature. Call the Register() method on an instance to add it to the game.

public abstract class CreatureAsset

Constructors

CreatureAsset(PrefabInfo)

Instantiates a Creature Asset with the given PrefabInfo. Call the Register method to add the creature to the game.

public CreatureAsset(PrefabInfo prefabInfo)

Parameters

prefabInfo PrefabInfo

Information required for spawning. Must be unique.

An instance of this struct can be easily created by calling Nautilus.Assets.PrefabInfo.WithTechType(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Reflection.Assembly).

Properties

ClassID

The ClassID of this creature, sourced from the PrefabInfo property.

public string ClassID { get; }

Property Value

string

CustomPrefab

A reference to the custom prefab instance for this creature. Note that this custom prefab is registered once the Register() method is called.

public ICustomPrefab CustomPrefab { get; }

Property Value

ICustomPrefab

EntityInfo

The EntityInfo for this creature, only assigned after Register() is called.

public WorldEntityInfo EntityInfo { get; }

Property Value

WorldEntityInfo

PrefabInfo

Essential information for registering the prefab.

public PrefabInfo PrefabInfo { get; }

Property Value

PrefabInfo

TechType

The TechType of this creature, sourced from the PrefabInfo property.

public TechType TechType { get; }

Property Value

TechType

Methods

ApplyMaterials(GameObject)

By default calls Nautilus.Utility.MaterialUtils.ApplySNShaders(UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.MaterialModifier[]) to convert the materials of the entire prefab. Can be overriden to have more control over the process.

protected virtual void ApplyMaterials(GameObject prefab)

Parameters

prefab GameObject

CreateTemplate()

This method expects a CreatureTemplate instance. This class holds all the settings regarding the creature's automatic prefab initialization, alongside various patch-time factors.

protected abstract CreatureTemplate CreateTemplate()

Returns

CreatureTemplate

ModifyPrefab(GameObject, CreatureComponents)

Changes to the prefab can be applied here.

protected abstract IEnumerator ModifyPrefab(GameObject prefab, CreatureComponents components)

Parameters

prefab GameObject
components CreatureComponents

Returns

IEnumerator

PostRegister()

An empty method that can be overriden to insert code that runs directly after the prefab is registered (runs at patch time immediately after Register() is called).

protected virtual void PostRegister()

Register()

Registers this creature's CustomPrefab into the game. This should only ever be called once, after everything else related to the creature has been finalized.

public void Register()
